name: linnet
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small brown and grey bird with a red front, found in Europe, Africa, and Asia: There were birds in cages all around, mostly linnets and canaries.
MikeLane45/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesThe linnet lifted its beak and uttered a few melancholy notes as she opened the cage door.Two bright goldfinches and one red-breasted linnet were just standing there. Goldfinches and linnets happened to be two of the reserve's commonest species.You can always tell the linnets by their bouncy flight.
